channel.title: Full HD || Webclient || FAST XP || Slow skilling || PK || NPC PJers ||
channel.description:
[right][size=36pt]We aint got that donator only item shit![/size][/right]
[size=24pt]We got cut-scenes![/size]
[size=14pt]We got NPCS in wildy acting as Pjers killing players AND npcs... WHAT NOW?![/size]
[center][size=18pt]www.blazinrescuer.co.nr/[/size] [/center] For webclient click play now Client download is on fourms.
We got PVP highscores We got regular highscores [font=georgia][size=14pt]We are on a VPS 24-7[/size][/font] We have PVP titles [size=8pt](earned... by killing people... noob!)[/size] We have Loyal member titles ::titles We have PVP ranks We have PVP drops We have PVP points
We have glitches fixed towards skilling ( fast skilling rates too!) [center]We NEED Staff[/center]
FAST XP rates, old school home page, .... everything everyone wants to get in runescape with just a easy command.... FTW?!
[size=50pt]Get your 99 and go kill stuff... what are you waiting for? a hug?! [/size]

item.title: Full HD || Webclient || FAST XP || Slow skilling || PK || NPC PJers ||
item.dc:creator: @777slots2 777slots2
item.description:
@777slots2 wrote:

[quote=“Taharahora, post:15, topic:463236”][quote author=777slots2 link=topic=566617.msg4121303#msg4121303 date=1349754684]
azureify leach, this npc says it all…

[/quote]

oh really? that npc was just quickly reput in til i finish all the legit teleports for 1.
and i already said this was zenithscape. guess what zenithscapes base was?
I have fixed countless bugs on this you dont believe me? check the tut section and check ingame for the bugs that use to be there…

leech? everything is a leech, did i NOT do anything? think the fuck again before commenting.

EDIT: i have implanted tons of content in this base. and only had it a few weeks, and this is my first 608+, next time fucking look around before making a dumbass comment.[/quote]
Dude, are you rustled? No way bro you ‘implanted’ tons of content!!! I think you’re like some sort of wizard, maybe i should think twice about posting i your thread. Just a tip, people notice the little things that are extremely easy and are usually done right away like changing one word, more than these supposed ‘bugs’ that everyone is fixing now a days.

NO PIX NO CLIX SON

Read full topic

item.title: Full HD || Webclient || FAST XP || Slow skilling || PK || NPC PJers ||
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

[quote=“Rameez, post:11, topic:463236”][quote author=Taharahora link=topic=566617.msg4120809#msg4120809 date=1349705690]

Should really consider adding some media, I’d like to know what I’m joining without bothering to waste my time in downloading a cache.

zenithscape’s cache you most likely already have it on your computer. And I suck at media. want a mod spot? help with a youtube vid and some media and ya got it.
[/quote]

If you being the owner of the server are too redundant to grab media to make your own thread attractive in order to gain a specifically greater number of people than the current thread, than i highly doubt anyone would want to play such a server. Unless of course you’re trying not to post media seeing as you’ve not done much and it’s just another download and host server.[/quote]

Not at all i had pictures with tinypic but they kept disappearing i even contacted a mod about it. i cbf to put more up esp since now im studying for midterm exams which are tomorrow

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

we are going nowhere fast, so decided to go into a different direction with this. been about a month and still 0 player base, so we looked at some servers and see the fast xp and spawning is what most players stick to. so here you go.

Read full topic

item.title: Full HD || Webclient || FAST XP || Slow skilling || PK || NPC PJers ||
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

thakillah:

Uhm jou are the one who kept making treads in the help section and first changed home snip added npc snip added shops lol the others are probably going to say the same thing

our server has more then that, NPCvsNPC(only tut is one i made), fully working turm (most 728s lack that.), a webclient (there is tuts but a lot have trouble getting it on cause you need to change loader.class with loader.java. I have fixed countless bugs and released them to the community, ie. the bone dropping bug, death you don’t drop anything npcs who drop stuff it doesnt show up over time for another player, working divine, working GWD with KC, all places you go to you have to run around like real runescape, obviously its a remake, (besides norm teleports.), real working qbd, the base source had some weird light matches thing and it spawns, DT us eto dc you i fixed that (no tut on that.) list go on and on… so like i said look before commenting.

edit : thanks for the bumps

Read full topic
